reviews.text:
Grandfather has been coming to this restaurant since the 1970s. He loves their steak sandwich.

We liked the steak sandwich too, although we personally wished it had a bit more flavor. However, we still highly recommend trying it. We especially enjoyed the version with sauce on the side and cheese. There is a fee for both a side of red gravy sauce and to add cheese. Approximately a couple of dollars for cheese to be added. The regular-sized sandwich was perfect for one person, but if you're sharing, we suggest ordering the king size.

A large crowd arrived shortly after we did (around noon), so we recommend coming between 11:00 and 11:30 AM on a weekday to beat the rush. Our food took about 15 minutes to arrive.

It was really good! I got the Sicilian Beef which I thought could have had a little more flavor,  but it was good,  tender, and juicy.  My husband got the Breaded Steak sandwich which I also tried. Very good,  very messy lol.  The pizza though was not the best.  It was rubbery and I think they reheated it & I'm not sure how long it had been sitting out.  We had gone a little early though so that may have been the issue

This is such a good South Side restaurant. The food is fabulous- from pizza slices to a breaded steak sandwich. My wife LOVES the eggplant parm sandwich.  They get food out pretty quickly, even when they are really busy. We were there on a Friday night at 9 pm and the place was packed- which should tell you a lot!

Came for the iconic breaded steak sandwich and it didn't disappoint. The sandwich came out quickly and was loaded and there's even a bigger size. Although the steak was smothered in sauce, I could still taste some crunch from it, and the hot giardiniera was also prominent.

Terrible experience tonight. Ordered way ahead of time and selected a 6:30 pick up. Got there and nothing was ready as usual. The kid ran away and never came back. Then about 20 mins later my pizza was done and sat on the counter to get nice and cold. Then the rest of the order showed up a total of 30 mins later at (6:50). By now the pizza is literally ice cold. I got home and at least expected the order to be done well. Well I‚Äôll let the picture speak for its self. I‚Äôm hopeful someone connects with me because this is unacceptable for $33 worth of food. Terrible.

editorial_summary.overview: Old-school pizza parlor serving a famous breaded steak sandwich alongside pizza & Italian standards.

recentReviews.text: Best Breaded Steak Sandwich in the Midwest. Highly recommend you stop by if you are in the area. Fresh cut fries are also fantastic.
Chicago must have! The breaded steak sandwich is every bit worth the hype and the pizza was amazing too.

Wonderful,friendly and so eager to please the customers ! The food has been very consistent every since l was purchasing almost 40 years ! So l definitely encourage others to enjoy the atmosphere of dining indoors at the BEST pizza location in Chicago ! If you need deliveries always Ricobene is top notch in being on time or before ! PROMPTNESS they excell at with their deliveries always ! YUM ! Sincerely Mr.DC
Amazing pizza, can't wait to go try a famous sandwich.
A lot of history and good food here. Always a go to place to eat after a night out or after a game. Their breaded steak sandwich is a one of a kind delight.

detailedReviews.author: Brenna Trapp
detailedReviews.text:
Heard a lot about this place so we decided to give it a try while we were in town. The food was just okay but for the price was a really good deal! This place had people coming in and out non-stop, can‚Äôt imagine what they make in a night. My husband tried the breaded steak sandwich which was pretty good. I got a slice of deep dish pizza, not sure what the flavor was but whatever it was, I do not recommend. We also tried a slice of cheese and pepperoni which were decent. The jalape√±o poppers were good but I‚Äôve never had one I didn‚Äôt like!

When you get into the building, you walk up to the counter to order which I also wasn‚Äôt expecting. If you‚Äôre look for quick cheap eats and not expecting anything spectacular, I‚Äôd recommend.

detailedReviews.author: Star3 Harris
detailedReviews.text: For Starters, my family and I have ate from Ricobenes for years. Yes they have a whole new set of employees and managers. They‚Äôre not customer service friendly, and they are very rude. The people who answers the phone I‚Äôm assuming have nothing better to do than to provoke their customers. They answer rudely and don‚Äôt let you finish your order. Then have the nerve to make my things wrong. I called back about my order of $62 damn dollars, so of course I‚Äôm pissed about my order. I call back to speak with a manager, which I spoke with Michael. He is very also rude. And telling me that I can‚Äôt have the employee name because she did her job by arguing with me, and provoking me because I asked to speak with a manager about my order. Which actually pops up when we call ( the order, my number, and my address) so she was being arrogant and nasty how they‚Äôre usually are. Michael the manager came defending before he heard my side and proceeded to argue with me about her action and when I told him she was being nasty and arguing with me over a question I didn‚Äôt answer because it shows them and I was calling back to speak with an manager whom I just got off the phone with about remaking an item. So of course as a manger he hung up on me. Without giving me the employee name. He felt as if she did her job and as someone who also works in a establishment as an manager she was supposed to listen, and if the customer is angry or even frustrated about an order of $62 dollars then try to de-escalate the situation. I told her I was just on the phone with an manager whom I told I will call back about my orders instead of her transferring me like the first girl did she questioned me about some she can‚Äôt help me with also something she see on her screen when my number pops up.. while I‚Äôm not the type to allow this behavior when I‚Äôm spending my money on food this review will not be the end of this problem. I also had someone come back out to redeliver sandwhich they messed up that I Paid Extra For. The delivery driver tells me I have to exchange sandwiches I gave away to the homeless people outside of my establishment which is on camera.. for 1 you can not take back food you gave away for sanitary conditions. So the driver did not give me the sandwiches and left. So I paid $62 for Nothing. I ordered 3 sandwiches, 3 hot fries, and 1 bottles fruit punch. And Although my whole order was wrong or not edible the only was right was the bottle fruit punch. All I ask out my whole order is for a remake of my sandwiches.

detailedReviews.author: Dana Hand
detailedReviews.text: Wings were soggy. Everything else was great!

detailedReviews.text: I dream about the breaded steak sandwich ü§§

detailedReviews.text: Nice classic Italian and local restaurant on the Southside. I went back to enjoy their buffalo wings on fries.  Just as good as I remember.

detailedReviews.text: I have heard so many things about the food here & it didn‚Äôt disappoint. Food is fantastic. I will be back here again. I definitely recommend.

detailedReviews.text: This place is what hot sandwich dreams are made of. The portions are huge and I‚Äôve never had a bad meal here.

detailedReviews.text: Ordered spinach deep dish pizza slice and it didn't taste the same. It was very bland and the crust was mushy in some parts which was unusual. I always stop by if I'm in town or in the area. Not sure if I will be eating there again soon. The food is definitely different.

detailedReviews.text: Delicious steak sanwitches! Must try!

detailedReviews.author: eric torres
detailedReviews.text:
As a new visitor to Chicago i was looking forward to trying a ‚Äúclassic‚Äù deep dish pizza. I ordered on online at 12:09am

TIMELINE AS FOLLOWS;
Order pizza; 12:09am
Arrives at location and informs about made order; 12:50am (ish)
Talks to 3 different people about order; 12:50am-1:25am
I order a Italian ice and inquire about order AGAIN; 1:28am
At 1:30ish I am informed that the order hasn‚Äôt even been started

Im given the option of a refund or they could try to talk to the cooks about making the order made. Understanding the time and it‚Äôs close to closing (2am) I just take the return. Solid Italian ice tho.

I leave disappointed that the manager never came out to talk to me directly nor apologized about the situation. Kinda rude, and you know kinda weak leadership vibes. Maybe I‚Äôll have better luck at Pequod‚Äôs. :(

detailedReviews.author: Brian Pawlowski
detailedReviews.text: The chicken vasuvio isn't many people's 1st choice.  But its the best sandwich I've had there by far.

detailedReviews.author: Dwayne Babiarz
detailedReviews.text: Got to get the breaded steak steak! Was tender and tasty

detailedReviews.author: Superwoman. Inc
detailedReviews.text: Can‚Äôt go wrong going here for a late night snack‚Ä¶ and I just discovered they have Italian ice ‚Ä¶. Yessssss try it !!!!

detailedReviews.author: Rosario Di Gangi
detailedReviews.text: Food is so consistently amazingly delicious everytime. Try Everything

detailedReviews.author: Carletha Bew
detailedReviews.text: Very good breaded steak sandwich.

detailedReviews.author: Tim Moon
detailedReviews.text: The best Italian breaded steak sammy hands down

detailedReviews.author: Orlando sausageking Cook
detailedReviews.text: They charge for sweet peppers and cheese wow thought it came with it

detailedReviews.author: Melissa Belsis
detailedReviews.text: Has all the Chicago classics, quick service, and great atmosphere.

detailedReviews.author: Mary Jane
detailedReviews.text: Honestly, my children and I go here at least three times a month & order delivery at least 2 month. Not once have I ever complained asked for my order to be remade or had any kind of issue. Today I was the first and maybe even the last time I spend my hard earned money with Rico Bene‚Äôs. I asked for light sauce meat sauce and got the opposite. So I called asked to have it remade and when the delivery man arrived he asked for the old pasta which I said I threw it away. The delivery driver said okay the manger calls me and tells me to garbage pick it and give it him which is crazy! Gave me a horrible attitude & disregarded me in the up most ugliest way ever!!! I can‚Äôt even with this situation the lack of people skills. I know the owner the family and honestly this is not the kind of people they need behind their phone lines!

detailedReviews.author: Amy Kaufman
detailedReviews.text: Fabulous as always. My favorite pizza when we are in town.

detailedReviews.author: Mario W
detailedReviews.text: The King Size Breaded Steak Sandwich with Mottzerrell cheese added is the best sandwich. All their food taste fantastic. You can't go wrong eating anything from there. Pizza is also fantastic whichever way you buy it. Whole or by the slice. Customers keep coming back because the food is so good there. I've been eating there a long time. Now my children are adults and take their kids there. If you haven't experienced fantastic food I suggest you give it a try. You won't be disappointed.

detailedReviews.author: AC Mikell (Awesome/AC Wolf)
detailedReviews.text: The eggplant parm sandwich is awesome! My coworkers swear by the steak sandwich and the chicken parm sandwich!!

detailedReviews.author: Ceciletravelinfo
detailedReviews.text: Famous breaded steak sandwich that‚Äôs saucy and satisfying.

detailedReviews.author: Velazquez Andalusians
detailedReviews.text:
Best food

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers are genuinely thrilled with their experience. With an average 4.5/5 rating across 100 recent reviews, your restaurant consistently exceeds expectations.

strengthsPerceived: The breaded steak sandwich is a one-of-a-kind delight that customers dream about and is highly recommended for anyone visiting the area. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
The restaurant excels at prompt and reliable delivery service, consistently being on time or even early. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
The dining atmosphere is wonderful and friendly, with a long-standing history of consistent quality for almost 40 years. - SEO services can leverage this for better visibility
improvementOpportunities: Negative customer service experiences and rude interactions with staff - review management can address this concern
Long wait times and order mishandling - Boostly marketing services can improve this
Poor online visibility and competition with other local restaurants - SEO services can solve this visibility issue
